entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:36 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
